revised_title: Muscular Arrangements of the Bladder and Prostate: A New Perspective
tldr: The author conducted detailed dissections and analyses of the bladder and prostate to better understand their muscular arrangements. They discovered that the fibers in both organs are curvilinear and lemniscate, or spiral-shaped, which helps clarify previous conflicting descriptions of their structure. This research provides a more accurate understanding of the muscular anatomy of the bladder and prostate, which can aid in medical treatments and procedures.
